text: Janko Tipsarević was the defending champion and successfully defended his title, defeating Oscar Otte 6–3, 7–6(11–9) in the final. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ===Bottom half=== ==References== *Main Draw *Qualifying Draw ZS-Sports China International Challenger - Singles Category:2017 in Chinese sport
